## Summary
Brief description of what this change does.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Documentation only

## Shell Script Review Checklist
- [ ] ShellCheck passes with no warnings
- [ ] No unquoted variables
- [ ] No use of eval
- [ ] No unsafe rm or chmod usage
- [ ] Environment variables validated
- [ ] Network calls handle failure safely
- [ ] Logging added or updated if behavior changed

## Security Considerations
Describe any security impact or explain why there is none.

## Testing Performed
- [ ] Dry run tested
- [ ] Docker run tested
- [ ] No secrets committed
